-- creating views based on delta tables in adls gold container


--- creating dimension tables views
create view vw_dim_sentiment
as
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_sentiment/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];

create view vw_dim_brand
as
SELECT brand_uk, brand
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_brand/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];

create view vw_dim_job_role
as
SELECT job_role_id, job_role
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_job_role/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];

create view vw_dim_license_type
as
SELECT license_type_id, license as license_type
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_license/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];



create view vw_dim_date
as
SELECT date, year, month, 
DATENAME(MONTH, date) AS MonthName,
quarter, day_in_month
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_date/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


create view vw_dim_certification
as
SELECT certification_uk, certification_id, certification_name, brand_uk, latest_version, last_copied
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_certification/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];



create view vw_dim_partner
as
SELECT partner_company_id, partner_company,partner_id, partner_first_name, partner_last_name, tgt_job_role, multiple_cert_holder, location_id
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_partner/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];

create view vw_dim_ise
as
SELECT ise_id, ise as industry_solution_experience
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_ise/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];

create view vw_dim_ipe
as
SELECT ipe_id, ipe as industry_process_experience
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_ipe/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


create view vw_dim_industry
as
SELECT industry_id, industry
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_industry/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


create view vw_dim_location
as
SELECT location_id, region, country, state 
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_location/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


create view vw_dim_license
as
SELECT license_id as license_type_id,  license_type
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_dim_license/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


--- create fact table views


create view dbo.vw_fact_certificationpassdatelatest
as
SELECT brand_uk,partner_id, ise_id, ipe_id, industry_id, certification_uk, pass_date, last_copied
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_fact_certificationpassdatelatest/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


create view vw_fact_sales
as
SELECT uk_id, partner_company_id, partner_id, certification_uk, ise_id, ipe_id, year_name, 
case month
    when 'Jan' then 'January'
    when 'Feb' then 'February'
    when 'Mar' then 'March'
    when 'Apr' then 'April'
    when 'May' then 'May'
    when 'Jun' then 'June'
    when 'Jul' then 'July'
    when 'Aug' then 'August'
    when 'Sep' then 'September'
    when 'Oct' then 'October'
    when 'Nov' then 'November'
    when 'Dec' then 'December'
    else month
END AS MonthName,
license_id as license_type_id, sales, last_copied
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_fact_sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];


CREATE view vw_fact_newssentiment
as
select location_id, industry_id, year_name, 
case month
    when 'Jan' then 'January'
    when 'Feb' then 'February'
    when 'Mar' then 'March'
    when 'Apr' then 'April'
    when 'May' then 'May'
    when 'Jun' then 'June'
    when 'Jul' then 'July'
    when 'Aug' then 'August'
    when 'Sep' then 'September'
    when 'Oct' then 'October'
    when 'Nov' then 'November'
    when 'Dec' then 'December'
    else month
END AS MonthName,
sentiment_id, last_copied
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_fact_newssentiment/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as [result];



create view vw_partnerlicense_salesrecords
as
SELECT a.uk_id, a.partner_company_id, a.partner_id, a.certification_uk, b.brand_uk, b.industry_id, a.ise_id, a.ipe_id, b.pass_date, a.year_name, 
case a.month
    when 'Jan' then 'January'
    when 'Feb' then 'February'
    when 'Mar' then 'March'
    when 'Apr' then 'April'
    when 'May' then 'May'
    when 'Jun' then 'June'
    when 'Jul' then 'July'
    when 'Aug' then 'August'
    when 'Sep' then 'September'
    when 'Oct' then 'October'
    when 'Nov' then 'November'
    when 'Dec' then 'December'
    else month
END AS MonthName,
a.license_id as license_type_id, a.sales, a.last_copied
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_fact_sales/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as a
JOIN
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://proje2e.dfs.core.windows.net/gold-partnersales/sales/delta/gold_fact_certificationpassdatelatest/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) as b

ON a.partner_id = b.partner_id AND
    a.certification_uk = b.certification_uk AND
    a.ise_id = b.ise_id AND
    a.ipe_id = b.ipe_id
;
